title: Can you still refer a friend?
body: I know its been a while and at some point it was disabled because of the abuse but I was wondering where could I find it or is permanently gone? I don't know if it's already been confirmed if so. I appreciate anyone confirm it for me. Thank you very much!

replies.body: As for now, the refer a friend program will not be coming back. We decided to end the RAF program on Sep 5 in 2015 since we were making the move towards other systems like the hextech crafting system! You can check up on the post we made about it going away [**here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/update-refer-friend-now-retired)!
